auth.bioPlaceholder: Describe your experience and medical specialty (maximum 1000 characters)
auth.registerSubtitle: Create your account to start booking medical appointments
auth.registerDoctorSubtitle: Create your professional account to offer your medical services
auth.rateLimitExceeded: You have exceeded the attempt limit. Try again in {minutes} minutes
auth.geocodingFailed: Could not geocode the address. Registration will continue without coordinates.
auth.geocodingWarning: You can continue with registration. Geocoding will be attempted again on the backend.
auth.googleMapsNotAvailable: Google Maps is not available. Registration will continue without showing the map.

search.title: Search Doctors
search.resultsFound: {count, plural, =0 {No results found} one {# result found} other {# results found}}
search.noResults: No doctors found with the specified criteria. Try expanding the search radius or changing the specialty.
search.searchError: Error searching for doctors. Please try again.
search.googleMapsError: Error loading Google Maps. Please check your connection.
